data.title: Sugar Land, TX - Official Website
data.meta_description: Sugar Land, located in eastern Fort Bend County, is approximately 20 miles southwest of downtown Houston. A full-service municipality, Sugar Land, provides the highest quality of affordable services to meet the needs of its residents.
data.text:
City offices will be closed Monday, September 2 in observance of Labor Day.

There will be no interruptions to solid waste collections. Republic Services will operate according to its regular collection schedule.

Find more information about waste schedules here.

NOTICE OF ADOPTED 2023 TAX RATE

City of Sugar Land has adopted a tax rate that will raise more taxes for maintenance and operations than last year's tax rate. The tax rate will effectively be raised by 3.16 percent and will raise taxes for maintenance and operations on a $100,000 home by approximately $3.90.
